about.title: Built for Vietnamese Education
about.subtitle: FrogEdu is specifically designed for Vietnamese primary schools (Grades 1-5), combining cutting-edge AI technology with proven educational methods to create an intuitive platform that teachers and students love.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Classroom?
cta.subtitle: Join teachers across Vietnam using FrogEdu to create smarter assessments and empower student learning

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about FrogEdu

q1.question: How does the Smart Exam Generator work?
q1.answer: The Smart Exam Generator uses AI to analyze your exam matrix (difficulty distribution and topic coverage) and automatically selects questions from our extensive question bank. You can always manually override selections if needed.

q2.question: Is FrogEdu suitable for all grade levels?
q2.answer: Yes! FrogEdu covers Vietnamese primary education grades 1-5. Each grade has age-appropriate content and difficulty levels tailored to curriculum standards.

q3.question: Can I export exams in different formats?
q3.answer: Currently, we support PDF and DOCX exports. All files are stored securely in AWS S3 and delivered via presigned URLs for safe access.

q4.question: How does the AI Tutor help students?
q4.answer: The AI Tutor uses a Socratic method to guide students through problems without giving direct answers. It references relevant textbook content and maintains conversation history for teachers to review.

q5.question: Is there a free trial available?
q5.answer: Yes! We offer a free trial so you can explore all features. No credit card required to get started. Sign up today to begin transforming your classroom.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for tips, updates, and exclusive educator resources

hero.subtitle: FrogEdu is an innovative AI-powered educational platform designed specifically for Vietnamese primary education, combining cutting-edge technology with pedagogical excellence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph_one: We believe every child deserves access to quality education. Our mission is to democratize learning by providing teachers and students with powerful AI tools that make education more engaging, personalized, and effective.
mission.paragraph_two: By focusing on the Vietnamese primary education curriculum (Grades 1-5), we ensure our platform aligns perfectly with national educational standards while incorporating innovative teaching methodologies.

features.title: What We Offer
features.subtitle: Our platform provides comprehensive tools for both teachers and students

ai_exam.title: AI Exam Generation
ai_exam.description: Generate customized exams aligned with Vietnamese curriculum using advanced AI. Create multiple choice, fill-in-the-blank, and essay questions instantly.

class_management.title: Class Management
class_management.description: Create and manage classes, assign homework, track student progress, and communicate with students all in one place.

textbooks.title: Digital Textbooks
textbooks.description: Access comprehensive digital textbooks for Vietnamese primary education with interactive content and learning materials.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: FrogEdu is built by a passionate team of educators, engineers, and designers who believe in the power of technology to transform education.
team.made_in_description: Built with Vietnamese education in mind
